answers.answer: Hi,Peripheral neuropathy can be caused by metabolic conditions like diabetes, thyroid disorders and by vitamin deficiencies like B 12 deficiency.The treatment will depend upon the cause which can be identified by clinical exam and tests like blood tests.Certain neurological conditions like mini stroke and MS also cause pins and needles like sensations in the body.http://www.ninds.nih.gov/disorders/peripheralneuropathy/detail_peripheralneuropathy.htmhttp://www.mayoclinic.com/health/peripheral-neuropathy/DS00131Thanks
